Meta.title: Variable Sprite Support
Meta.author: DK
Meta.description:
[h1]Variable Sprite Support (formerly High Res Sprite Fix)[/h1]
Allows the usage of variable resolutions and ratios of PCC sprites and accordingly fit them onto the PCC.
[h1]Parts[/h1]
[img=https://i.postimg.cc/8j6K3Zjf/demo-en.png]
Mod authors can now create PCC parts with sprites other than 32x48.
[h1]Body[/h1]
Body sprite still needs to be in the ratio of 2:3, but the resolution doesn't matter. You can use a large canvas if that helps.
[h1]Credits[/h1]
Mirkhan for the idea and help with testing. noa for not setting all textures on GPU side so I don't have to copy and blit
